title: Line to Candle Transition
description: Master the fundamental transition from line charts to candlestick patterns. Learn to read price action and identify key reversal and continuation signals.

modules.title: Chart Foundation
modules.description: Understand the basics of price visualization and chart types

lessons.title: Line vs Candle Charts
lessons.content:
The transition from line charts to candlesticks is fundamental to technical analysis. Each chart type reveals different information about market behavior.

**Line Chart Basics:**
â€¢ Shows closing prices over time
â€¢ Smooth, continuous line
â€¢ Good for trend identification
â€¢ Lacks price action detail
â€¢ Easy to read for beginners

**Candlestick Advantages:**
â€¢ Shows open, high, low, close (OHLC)
â€¢ Reveals price action patterns
â€¢ Indicates market sentiment
â€¢ Shows volatility and momentum
â€¢ Provides entry/exit signals

**Why This Matters:**
â€¢ Line charts hide important data
â€¢ Candlesticks show market psychology
â€¢ Better for timing entries/exits
â€¢ Essential for pattern recognition

lessons.title: Candlestick Anatomy
lessons.content:
**Candlestick Components:**
â€¢ Body (open to close)
â€¢ Wicks/shadows (high/low)
â€¢ Color coding (green/red)
â€¢ Size indicates volatility

**Body Interpretation:**
â€¢ Large body = strong momentum
â€¢ Small body = indecision
â€¢ Long wicks = rejection
â€¢ No wicks = strong move

**Color Psychology:**
â€¢ Green = bullish (close > open)
â€¢ Red = bearish (close < open)
â€¢ Context matters more than color
â€¢ Volume confirms direction

modules.title: Basic Patterns
modules.description: Learn to identify fundamental candlestick patterns

lessons.title: Single Candle Patterns
lessons.content:
**Doji Patterns:**
â€¢ Indecision in the market
â€¢ Small body, long wicks
â€¢ Potential reversal signal
â€¢ Volume confirms direction

**Hammer/Hanging Man:**
â€¢ Long lower wick
â€¢ Small body at top
â€¢ Hammer = bullish reversal
â€¢ Hanging man = bearish reversal

**Shooting Star/Inverted Hammer:**
â€¢ Long upper wick
â€¢ Small body at bottom
â€¢ Shooting star = bearish
â€¢ Inverted hammer = bullish

**Marubozu:**
â€¢ No wicks (strong move)
â€¢ Large body
â€¢ Strong momentum
â€¢ Continuation likely

lessons.title: Two-Candle Patterns
lessons.content:
**Engulfing Patterns:**
â€¢ Second candle engulfs first
â€¢ Bullish engulfing = reversal up
â€¢ Bearish engulfing = reversal down
â€¢ Strong reversal signal

**Harami Patterns:**
â€¢ Second candle inside first
â€¢ Indicates indecision
â€¢ Potential reversal
â€¢ Volume confirmation needed

**Tweezers:**
â€¢ Same high/low levels
â€¢ Support/resistance test
â€¢ Reversal potential
â€¢ Multiple timeframes confirm

modules.title: Volume Confirmation
modules.description: Use volume to validate candlestick signals

lessons.title: Volume Analysis
lessons.content:
**Volume Principles:**
â€¢ High volume = strong signal
â€¢ Low volume = weak signal
â€¢ Volume precedes price
â€¢ Divergence = warning sign

**Volume Patterns:**
â€¢ Increasing volume = trend strength
â€¢ Decreasing volume = trend weakness
â€¢ Volume spike = potential reversal
â€¢ Volume dry-up = consolidation

**Confirmation Rules:**
â€¢ Pattern + volume = strong signal
â€¢ Pattern without volume = weak
â€¢ Volume without pattern = noise
â€¢ Multiple confirmations = stronger
